001package ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.poster;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.poster.PosterOutputPort;
004import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.poster.PosterPipeline;
005import ca.gc.cra.radar.config.PosterConfig;
006import ca.gc.cra.radar.config.PosterConfig.DecodeMode;
007import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.protocol.ProtocolId;
008import java.util.Objects;
009
010/**
011 * File-based poster pipeline for HTTP message pairs.
012 * <p>Delegates rendering to {@link SegmentPosterProcessor} and requires file input/output paths.</p>
013 *
014 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
015 */
016public final class HttpPosterPipeline implements PosterPipeline {
017  private final SegmentPosterProcessor processor;
018
019  /**
020   * Creates a pipeline using the default {@link SegmentPosterProcessor}.
021   *
022   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
023   */
024  public HttpPosterPipeline() {
025    this(new SegmentPosterProcessor());
026  }
027
028  /**
029   * Creates a pipeline with a custom processor (primarily for tests).
030   *
031   * @param processor poster processor used to render segments
032   * @throws NullPointerException if {@code processor} is {@code null}
033   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
034   */
035  public HttpPosterPipeline(SegmentPosterProcessor processor) {
036    this.processor = Objects.requireNonNull(processor, "processor");
037  }
038
039  /**
040   * Identifies the protocol handled by this pipeline.
041   *
042   * @return {@link ProtocolId#HTTP}
043   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
044   */
045  @Override
046  public ProtocolId protocol() {
047    return ProtocolId.HTTP;
048  }
049
050  /**
051   * Renders HTTP pairs from the configured input directory into the output directory.
052   *
053   * @param config per-protocol configuration (file paths required)
054   * @param decodeMode decode mode controlling payload processing
055   * @param outputPort ignored (HTTP file pipeline writes via {@link SegmentPosterProcessor})
056   * @throws NullPointerException if {@code config} is {@code null}
057   * @throws Exception if reading or rendering fails
058   * @implNote Operates on filesystem inputs/outputs; {@code outputPort} is unused.
059   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
060   */
061  @Override
062  public void process(PosterConfig.ProtocolConfig config, DecodeMode decodeMode, PosterOutputPort outputPort) throws Exception {
063    Objects.requireNonNull(config, "config");
064    processor.process(
065        config.inputDirectory().orElseThrow(() -> new IllegalArgumentException("httpIn path required for file mode")),
066        config.outputDirectory().orElseThrow(() -> new IllegalArgumentException("httpOut path required for file mode")),
067        ProtocolId.HTTP,
068        decodeMode);
069  }
070}
